rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a defined risk-adjective.
statement_text: Some 96 per cent of elephant seal pups (Mirounga leonina) at three breeding sites where the H5N1 strain of avian flu was detected in the Valdes Peninsula region in southern Argentina died in October 2023, say Claudio Campagna at the Wildlife Conservation Society and his colleagues.
